name: Sophia Tailor
description: The way of Learning Design is all about the way you look on anything you see, or how you do imagine about something in your dream, also you need to be creative.
modalContent: Sophia Tailor is a designer at Google with a passion for creating innovative solutions. Her work focuses on user-centered design and creative problem-solving.
